DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the evaluation of the effectiveness of endoscopic Pancreatic Pseudocyst drainage using a metal stent.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Pancreatic Pseudocyst Drainage With a Metal Stent
DOC.criteria: 1. Subject is 18 years or older 2. Subject has pancreatic pseudocyst 3. Subject has medical indication for drainage of the pancreatic pseudocyst 4. Subject must be able to give informed consent 1. Any contraindication to endoscopic pseudocyst drainage 2. Subject is unable to give informed consent
